sentences.sentence: Stylopodium low-conic or discoid, pale yellow.

sentences.sentence: Results All of 40 cases were lateral discoid meniscus.
sentences.translation: 结果本组40例均为外侧盘状半月板。

sentences.sentence: Discoid lupus affects only the skin and can be identified by red marks on the face or neck.
sentences.translation: 盘状狼疮只影响皮肤并可通过面部或颈部红斑识别。
